summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Oak Cliff Gateway Tax Increment Financing (TIF) District Board of Directors will convene for a regular meeting on February 26, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. at Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room, with an option for videoconference participation. The primary purpose of the meeting is to discuss previous meeting records and review the implementation of a new housing policy.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to order and introduction of participants.
2. Public comments on agenda items 3 and 4.
3. Review and approval of the meeting record from December 11, 2023.
4. Discussion on the implementation of the Cityâ€™s new Housing Policy (DHP33) by the Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization Department, focusing on Equity Strategy Target Areas.

**Important Details**:  
- The meeting will include a review of the December meeting minutes, which requires board approval.
- The discussion on the new Housing Policy will address its implementation and the targeted equity strategy areas, although no formal action is required at this stage.

**Action Items**:  
The board is seeking approval for the meeting record from the December 11, 2023, meeting. Additionally, feedback will be gathered regarding the new Housing Policy, although no decisions are expected to be made during this discussion. 

The meeting will also include provisions for public participation and compliance with legal regulations regarding firearms in government meetings.
